description:
This Mod changes the color of the Perfect Biome to easily identify it.
For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v1.102.1
author: psychicEgg
read_me:
Odyssey Enhanced Biome Overlay

By psychicEgg

Maintained by Fred89210


The Default Overlay has a Background of Blue, and a Biome Target colour of slightly more Greeny-Blue - it's not surprising it can be very difficult to distinguish between the two layers, especially for CMDRs with visual difficulties.

It's important to note that not all planets have a Perfect Biome, in which case the custom color will not appear, you will only see the Original Blue.

It's impossible to have a different colour for each type of Biome as the shader doesn't receive that information.

The options are quite basic:
  • Elite Default
  • Method 1: Custom Target Colour (Choose your own colour for the Target Biome Layer)
  • Method 2: Custom Target Colour Only (The Blue Background is turned off. Makes it easier to find an area to land with adequate light.)

Fly Safe. o7

Preview
changelog:
- Ready For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0
- Improvement for EDHM-UI v3

description:
This Mod Controls the Ship Holograms.
For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v1.102.1
author: Fred89210
read_me:
Clean Screenshots Mod

By Fred89210


This mod Turns OFF the Holograms of Landing Pads, SRV Entrance and On Foot Entrance.

Use this mod to take beautiful Screenshots.

It is advisable to leave the Holograms activated when flying otherwise you will not see the location of your Pad.

When 'Show Mod Status' option is activated, the OwnShip Hologram (in the middle of the shield) Turns OFF when Turning OFF the External Holograms.

Now you can also choose to always Hide External Holograms when you are in SRV or On Foot.

An other option hides the Tire Tracks of the SRV in order to take Clean Screenshots.

Fly Safe. o7

Preview
changelog:
- Added options to automatically hide all holograms when in SRV, on foot, or using the free camera to keep holograms only when they are useful
- Ready For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0
- Improvement for EDHM-UI v3

author: Blue Mystic
read_me:
ED-GT [Graphic Tweaks]

By Blue Mystic

This mod is an interface to easily and safely edit the GraphicsConfigurationOverride.xml file.

Currently this mod allows you to:

  • Increase or Reduce the Amount of Stars shown in the Galaxy Map.
  • Increase or Reduce the Quality of the Textures for Planets.
  • Increase or Reduce the Quality of the Textures for the Galaxy Background.
  • Ensure the Colour Matrix to be the Default one, this is required by EDHM.

How to Apply Changes:

Contrary to regular 3PMods, the XML configurations belongs to the game itself.

Therefore, you need to click the Apply XML Changes orange button on this window.

And then you need to re-start the game, so your changes can take effect.


Check Our web site

description: This mod adds an Overlay to the FSS. This Overlay makes it easy to identify the different frequencies. For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v1.102.0
author: psychicEgg and Parduz
read_me:
FSS Overlay Mod

By psychicEgg and Parduz

Maintained by Fred89210


This is an optional Overlay for your FSS that every explorer should have.

The FSS Overlay Mod adds an informational overlay on top of the Filtered Spectral Analysis, and indicates what type of Celestial Bodies fall within a particular frequency band.

The Mod offers several excellent Overlays created by the community.

And don't hesitate to tell us on our Discord if you want to design your own overlay and we will help you integrate it into the Mod.

Fly Safe. o7

Click to Open Overlay Previews
changelog:
- Ready For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0
- Improvement for EDHM-UI v3

description:
This Mod allows to display the Scoopable Stars of a Single Color in order to recognize it easily.
For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v1.102.0
author: Fred89210
read_me:
Fuel Scooping Stars Mod

By Fred89210


This Mod allows to display the Scoopable Stars in a Single Color in order to recognize it easily.

You can also change the color of Non Sequence Stars (Black Holes and Neutron Stars) in filter view.


IMPORTANT INFORMATION:

In filter view Class-G Stars cannot be separated from Class-C Stars so Class-C Stars appear in the same color as Fuel Scooping Stars.

Class-C Stars are rare, it may be useful to disable them from the galaxy map filter.

Fly Safe. o7

Preview

- Ready For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0
- Improvement for EDHM-UI v3

description:
This Mod Customize your Hyperspace Jumps.
For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v1.102.0
author: Fred89210
read_me:
Hyperspace Mod

By Fred89210


This Mod Customize your Hyperspace Jumps.

  • Automatically Turn Off the HUD in Hyperspace
  • Disable the Light emitted by the Destination Star
  • Make Hyperspace Jumps Very Dark and Scary

NOTE: This Mod does NOT affect ARX items, some Cockpit Night Lights, and does NOT modify Fleet Carrier Jumps.

Click here to see Preview Video

description:
This Mod Controls your FID in the Main Menu.
For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v1.102.1
author: Fred89210
read_me:
No FID Mod

By Fred89210


You often share your screen and want to keep your Frontier ID (FID) private, this 3PMod is for you.

This 3PMod allows you to hide your FID displayed at the Bottom Left of the Main Menu.

Fly Safe and Fly Fast. o7

description:
This Mod Controls the Message Boxes.
For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v1.102.0
author: Fred89210
read_me:
No Message Box Mod

By Fred89210

Beta Version


When you are in Ship or SRV, this Mod allows you to Hide the Message Boxes that appear in the Lower Right Corner, such as when Creating a Route.

Other Message Boxes, such as when you are On Foot or those in the Menus, will still be displayed.

Fly Safe and Fly Fast. o7

description:

For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v0.01.73

Odyssey Light Night Mod

By CMDR R^L


This mod turns off the Light Reflection in SRV + SHIP + STATIONS and on foot.

Use this mod FOR COMBAT and less eye stress in some places like near sun or goid stations fight.

Light Reflection would hurt your cute eye's so this mod i made for such thing.


THIS MODE IS BETA all comments are welcome.

Off mod when take pic in Elite especially planets it have some side effects so use this mod only when there is hurt eye Light Reflection.

Fly Safe. o7

description:
This Mod controls the Glow and Thickness of Orbit / Gravity Well / Exclusion Zone Lines.
For Elite Dangerous 4.2.1.0. v1.102.0
author: psychicEgg
read_me:
Thick Orbit Lines Mod

By psychicEgg

Maintained by Fred89210


With this Mod you can increase the Glow and Width of your Orbit / Gravity Well / Exclusion Zone Lines (in addition to setting their colour and brightness in the Main Mod EDHM).

The effect applies to all types of lines (Orbit, Gravity Well, Exclusion Zone) as they can't be separated in this particular shader.

Preview
